name: Contract
description: Smart contract metadata profile aligned with ENSIP-24: contract text records and compiled metadata resolver profile.

attributes.name: alias
attributes.notes: Lower-friction display name for wallets, explorers, and apps.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Short description of the contract purpose (ENSIP-18 description)

attributes.name: avatar
attributes.description: Avatar URI for the contract profile (ENSIP-12 avatar)
attributes.notes: Typically IPFS URI, NFT reference, or HTTP(S) URL.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Primary project or app URL (ENSIP-18 url)

attributes.name: category
attributes.description: Contract category (e.g., defi, gaming, dao, utility, proxy, factory)

attributes.name: license
attributes.description: Official software license identifier for the source code
attributes.notes: Use SPDX identifier, e.g. MIT, GPL-3.0-only, Apache-2.0.

attributes.name: docs
attributes.description: Primary documentation URL for developers and users

attributes.name: compiledMetadata
attributes.description: URI to compiler-generated contract metadata (Solidity/Vyper/etc.) or resolver-backed compiledMetadata profile
attributes.notes: Text record form uses URI. Resolver profile supports multichain lookup by coinType and contentType.
